text: U cihuyan gotine! Deste Yezdan giredaye (ji bo wi dayine nake). Bi sedema we gotina wan, deste wane be giredane u li wan deherandine be kirine. Gotine wan nine! Le herdu deste wi ji vekirine ewa ca bive, wusa disixurine. U bi rasti fileti u quretiya piren ji wan, di gave biryarek ji Xudaye te, li bal te da hatibe hinartine, pir dibe. U me di nava wan da heya roya rabune hemuti, neyarti u xerez avetiye (idi ewan nabine desteki). Ewan ciqa gaveki ji bona qirine ra, agirek hilkiribin, Yezdan ewa agira temirandiye. Ewan di zemin da digerin, ku tevdaniyeki derxin u Yezdan bir xweber ji ji tevdanokan hez nake
